You have successfully complete the examination. Here is your result

Upgrading to Basic Premium gives you access to:

 1.Get access to ALL questions and answers. All YEARS. No limit!
 2.Get unlimited access to FULL EXAM.
 3.Use this App Offline. No data needed to study/answer questions.
 4.Get these UNN post utme past questions in PDF. Print them and study at your convenience.
 5.Get UNN latest news on WhatsApp and as text message. Be rest assured never to miss any UNN NEWS that affects you. We will be your eyes in UNN.
 6.Call/Chat with Admin any time any day and get response almost instantly.

 We will be your helpful friend.
 We will help answer/resolve your questions/issues almost immediately.

 7.Access our weekly contest without coins.
 8.Get access to ALL questions and answers.
With this plan, you get everything in BASIC, plus acces to join the UNN POST UTME LESSON
To access the App in Offline,Please Subscribe Premium Package by clicking below
" Access UNN post-utme Past Questions, Latest News and More"
See topics that have been asked in UNN Post-Utme
Did you face any technical issue while using this App? Please feel free to send an email to myunnpostutme@allschool.com.ng Or WhatsApp us on 08093785476

Please note: We have thousands of messages to respond to. Hence, it might take 2-7days to reply you. However, we give special attention to all our PREMIUM USERS. We answer their questions almost immediately. We urge you to upgrade to Premium now

Did you face any technical issue while using this App? Please feel free to send an email to myunnpostutme@allschool.com.ng Or WhatsApp us on 08093785476 \n\n Please note: We have thousands of messages to respond to. Hence, it might take 2-7days to reply you. However, we give special attention to all our PREMIUM USERS. We answer their questions almost immediately. We urge you to upgrade to Premium now

"This “MyUNN Post-Utme App” is the first of its kind, better than the rest!

 Features of this App:

 1. Study Questions: Here you can study all the available UNN Post-UTME Past Questions for both UTME and direct entry candidates. You can study the questions year by year, subject by subject!

 2. Take Exam: There are two categories:

 i) Take a full exam: Here you will be tested with the UNN post-utme official standard! You will be allowed to choose just 4 subjects. You will have just 1 hour to answer 60 questions. Questions will be picked randomly from all UNN past questions. You will be graded over 400! This will not only test your speed, it will test how prepared you are for the exam!

 ii) Take a Custom Exam: Here you can select the year, the subjects, how many questions and time. You are in control!

 3. Leaderboard: Here you will see the top members that have participated in the full exam. The good news is, once in a while, we will reward top participants with airtime or cash!

 4. UNN Syllabus: This will show you all the topics that UNN have asked from inception of post-utme. It will be categorized subject by subject. From experience, sometimes, UNN repeats questions from the same topic.

 5. UNN News: You will see all the latest UNN news. News such as post-utme form, admission list, academic calendar, etc. You will always be informed, that’s a guarantee!

 6. Articles: You will have access to exclusive articles that might not be online. Sometimes there are some UNN updates that are not online, you will see them in the articles section.

 7. UNN School Anthem: You will have access to the audio, video and lyrics of UNN School Anthem.

 8. Chat: Here you will have access to our tutorial/study groups. You will also have access to chat with Okereke Divine, an Admin of UNN News HUB that knows everything about UNN. You can ask him any question bothering you. He will answer within seconds.

 9. Join Facebook Group: You will have easy access to join our Facebook group. There you can meet other students and graduates of UNN, and lots more.

 10.Latest News on Allschool : You will have access to All the Latest News on Allschool Website (allschool.com.ng). That’s right, you will always be informed, and that’s also a guarantee!

 11. ExtraThe App is suitable for both UTME and direct entry candidates.


 SURPRISE: Except no8, all the above features can be accessed online for FREE! Yes that’s right 100% free online.


 DISCLAIMER: The Questions contained in this App are the original UNN Post UTME and Direct Entry Past questions. You might see similar but not exactly the same questions in your exam this year. We do not provide students with any material that promotes examination malpractice. The contents on this app are purely educational and suited for students preparing for UNN post-utme and Direct Entry. "

string.b: MyUNN Post-Utme App is powered by Allschool

resources.string: Please enter your ATM Card Details. The CVV is the last three digits at the back of your card. The MM and YYYY is the Month and Year your ATM card will expire. Card Number is the 16 digits on your ATM card. Please note that once your payment is successful, you will be upgraded to premium user automatically.

Enter your full name, select the “recharge card type” and enter the card PIN. After that, click on submit. This will send the PIN and other details to us. Once we confirm the PIN you send, we will upgrade you to a Premium User within minutes. You will be notified as soon as you have been upgraded.
Enter phone number (do not start with 0)
Press \'Yes\' for Make the app\n Offline?
You do not have enough Coin to participate contest.\n\nDo you want earn more Coins?

"This weekly contest was designed to ascertain how prepared you're for the main examination.

The questions you'll see during the exam are neither JAMB past questions nor UNN Post-utme past questions, but same format.
They are original questions compiled by our professional teachers.

You will be tested with the same standard UNN has been using for their screening. You will be given 1 hour to answer 60 questions. Your score will be over 400.

After the exam, if you're among the Top 50 users, your name will be on the contest leaderboard for a week."
Your previous request is still pending. Please be patient we will review your request as soon as we can.
a. When entering your phone number, do not start with 0. For example if your number is 08093785476, the number you will enter will be 8093785476
b. If you have issues receiving OTP, use another phone number.
c. If problem still persist, us on WhatsApp 08093785476

Kindly Note the following:
 a. When entering your phone number, do not start with 0. For example if your number is 08093785476, the number you will enter will be 8093785476 
 b. If you have issues receiving OTP, use another phone number.
 c. If problem still persist, contact us on WhatsApp 08093785476
Kindly Upgrade to Premium to take the FULL Exam as many times as you want. No limit! Other benefits of being a premium user are:
2. Get UNN post utme past questions in PDF
3. Get UNN latest news on WhatsApp and as text message
4. Call/Chat with Admin any time any day and get response almost instantly. And lots more!

Here you will be tested with the UNN Post-utme official standard! 

 You can only choose 4 subjects. You will have just 1 hour to answer 60 questions.You will be graded over 400! 

 Questions will be picked randomly from all UNN post utme past questions, JAMB PAST QUESTIONS and questions from our professional teachers. 

 This will help you face almost any question you see on the exam day. Also, if you practice many times, you have good chances of seeing the same or similar question on the main exam day. 

 After taking the full exam, your score will be on the leaderboard if you are among the top scorers. 

 IMPORTANT: Freemium users can take the full exam just three times. Premium users can take the full exam as much as they can.

Questions here are strictly UNN Post utme past questions and answers. You will be able to select the year and subject you want. You can also select the time the exam should last. 
Please note that your score won’t be uploaded to the leaderboard. 

 IMPORTANT: Freemium users can select four(4) different years while Premium users can select all the available years.

Here you can study all the available UNN Post-UTME Past Questions for both UTME and direct entry candidates. Just select the year and Subject you want to study the questions. 
By study, we mean you will see the questions, answers and explanations. 

 IMPORTANT: Freemium users can select four different years while Premium users can select all the available years.
Kindly Upgrade to Premium to access all the years. No limit!\n"Other benefits of being a premium user are:\n
To See other questions and answers, kindly download My UNN Post-utme App from play store or WhatsApp 08093785476
Questions loading, please be patient. Your wait time depends on your internet speed. Note that premium users can use the App offline. Questions loads within seconds
We will keep answering UNN Frequently Asked Questions in this section. Once in a while, check for new questions.
